long_description: Technical performance and classic style are blended perfectly to bring you the Astral Brewer Water Shoes for whitewater kayaking and other watersports. Durable Cordura(R) nylon uppers withstand frequent use on paddling trips. Breathable mesh on the tongues and at the tops of the toes helps keep your cool. Drainage holes at the front, sides and back allow water and silt to drain out. Midsoles securely cradle your feet, providing stable navigation through uneven terrain. Astral Brewer Water Shoes have sticky Stealth(R) rubber outsoles that provide good traction on wet rocks. Closeout.
short_description: Technical performance and classic style are blended perfectly to bring you the Astral Brewer Water Shoes for whitewater kayaking and other watersports.
